content:
Hi, we have a tenured associate professorship open at the University of Bergen in AI. Details here
https://www.jobbnorge.no/en/available-jobs/job/195801/associate-professor-in-information-science
Also open a PhD position in AI https://www.jobbnorge.no/en/available-jobs/job/195702/phd-position-in-information-science-ai Please forward to interested parties.

Associate professor in Information Science (195801) | University of Bergen
Job title: Associate professor in Information Science (195801), Employer: University of Bergen, Deadline: Sunday, January 10, 2021
PhD position in Information Science - AI (195702) | University of Bergen
Job title: PhD position in Information Science - AI (195702), Employer: University of Bergen, Deadline: Friday, January 8, 2021
